dcterms:creator: Jonathan Krause
Justin Johnson
Ranjay Krishna
Li Fei-Fei
dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset in the field of image paragraph generation containing 19,551 images, each paired with one human-annotated paragraph. On average, each paragraph consists of 67.5 words and each sentence contains 11.91 words.
dcterms:title: Stanford image paragraph dataset
